learneasy.trackprogress

Class ProgressTracker

  • java.lang.Object
    • learneasy.trackprogress.ProgressTracker

  • public class ProgressTracker
extends java.lang.Object
    This class keeps track of visited pages and marks earned throughout the lesson
    Version:
    1.0 22/05/15
    Author:
    Daniel Berhe
